description: Loku Ranasinghe Arachchige Sunil Shantha Vs The Hon. Attorney General, before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Loku Ranasinghe Arachchige Sunil Shantha Vs The Hon. Attorney General,
keywords: Offence of rape on a minor- Contradictions – Rape is a horrific offence that not only violates an individual’s physical anatomy but also inflicts profound psychological trauma leaving lasting scars on victims, the seriousness of the offence necessitates a robust legal response that serves not only to punish the offender, but also to deter potential future offences – Matters that need to be taken into consideration in determining a sentence – Aggravating circumstances.
legistation: Section 364(2)(e) of the Penal Code (as amended by Act No.22 of 1995.
